      • listFolderContent

        public java.lang.String listFolderContent(java.lang.Boolean isFoldersOnly,
                                          java.lang.Boolean isRecursive,
                                          java.lang.String... folderName)
                                   throws LsException
        Description copied from interface: LsInterface
        Return the string listing the folder content of the specified folders. If no folder names are specified, list the content of the current folder.
        Specified by:
        listFolderContent in interface LsInterface
        Parameters:
        isFoldersOnly - Boolean option to list only the folders
        isRecursive - Boolean option to recursively list the folder contents (traversing through all folders inside the specified folder)
        folderName - Array of String of folder names
        Throws:
        LsException

      • buildResult

        private java.lang.String buildResult(java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> paths,
                                     java.lang.Boolean isFoldersOnly,
                                     java.lang.Boolean isRecursive)
        Builds the resulting string to be written into the output stream.

        NOTE: This is recursively called if user wants recursive mode.

        Parameters:
        paths - - list of java.nio.Path objects to list
        isFoldersOnly - - only list the folder contents
        isRecursive - - recursive mode, repeatedly ls the child directories
        Returns:
        String to be written to output stream.
